channel.title: Help on this read dealing with sending e-mail
channel.description:
lets say you are sending mail to 20 diffrent people and you don't want any of them to know any of thems add
like
from: SETO@msn.com
to:(here it will say all 20 peoples adders is there any way of hidding that?)
it be great if ne can help

item.title: Help on this read dealing with sending e-mail
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

BCC should work, but if your doing it regularly i reccommend downloading a free mail client like pegasus.

I run a Society at my university with over 550 members and regularly have to email them all. Pegasus has things called distribution lsit whcih make this very easy adn blind to the recipients. I f you do goog then downlad pegasus pm me or come on irc an di will help you set it up

Read full topic
item.source: Help on this read dealing with sending e-mail

I think if you add their names to the BCC List it will hide their email addresses
